樂不可極.definition: (idiom) one should not overindulge in pleasure

樂不思蜀.definition: indulge in pleasure and forget home and duty (idiom)

樂亭.definition: Laoting county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

樂亭縣.definition: Laoting county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

樂天知命.definition: to be content with what one is

樂安.definition: Le'an county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi

樂安縣.definition: Le'an county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi

樂山.definition: see 樂山市|乐山市[Le4shan1 Shi4]

樂山市.definition: Leshan, prefecture-level city in Sichuan Province 四川省[Si4chuan1 Sheng3]

樂平.definition: see 樂平市|乐平市[Le4ping2 Shi4]

樂平市.definition: Leping, county-level city in Jingdezhen 景德鎮市|景德镇市[Jing3dezhen4 Shi4], Jiangxi

樂府詩集.definition: Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads, compiled in the 11th century by Guo Maoqian 郭茂倩[Guo1 Mao4 qian4]

樂意.definition: to be willing to do sth; to be ready to do sth; to be happy to do sth; content; satisfied

樂於.definition: willing (to do sth); to take pleasure in

樂昌.definition: see 樂昌市|乐昌市[Le4chang1 Shi4]

樂昌之鏡.definition: see 樂昌破鏡|乐昌破镜[Le4chang1-po4jing4]

樂昌分鏡.definition: see 樂昌破鏡|乐昌破镜[Le4chang1-po4jing4]

樂昌市.definition: Lechang, county-level city in Shaoguan 韶關市|韶关市[Shao2guan1 Shi4], Guangdong

樂昌破鏡.definition: lit. the story of the broken mirror of Princess Lechang 樂昌公主|乐昌公主[Le4chang1 Gong1zhu3] (In the tale, the princess and her husband, fearing separation during the turbulence of war, broke a bronze mirror in half. They each kept one half as a token, with the promise to reunite by matching the pieces together. They were indeed separated, but eventually reunited, with the mirror playing a crucial role in their reunion.) (idiom); fig. the reunion of separated lovers or the restoration of a relationship

樂東黎族自治縣.pinyin: lè dōng lí zú zì zhì xiàn

樂業.definition: Leye county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi

樂業縣.definition: Leye county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi

樂極生悲.definition: extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!

樂此不疲.definition: to enjoy sth and never tire of it (idiom)

樂歪.definition: to be thrilled; (of sb's mouth) to form a grin

樂浪郡.definition: Lelang commandery (108 BC-313 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea

樂清.definition: Yueqing, county-level city in Wenzhou 溫州|温州[Wen1 zhou1], Zhejiang

樂清市.definition: Yueqing, county-level city in Wenzhou 溫州|温州[Wen1 zhou1], Zhejiang

樂經.definition: Book of Music, said to be one of the Six Classics lost after Qin's burning of the books in 212 BC, but may simply refer to Book of Songs 詩經|诗经

樂羊羊.definition: Happy sheep (group of five cartoon sheep), mascot of 2010 Guangzhou Asian games 廣州亞運會|广州亚运会

樂至.definition: Lezhi county in Ziyang 資陽|资阳[Zi1 yang2], Sichuan

樂至縣.definition: Lezhi county in Ziyang 資陽|资阳[Zi1 yang2], Sichuan

樂色.definition: (slang) (pun on the Taiwan pr. of 垃圾[la1ji1])

樂見.definition: to be pleased to see (a circumstance, occurrence etc); to look favorably on

樂見其成.definition: to look favorably on sth; would be glad see it happen

樂觀其成.definition: to look favorably on sth; would be glad to see it happen

樂道.definition: to take delight in talking about sth; to find pleasure in following one's convictions

樂陵.definition: Laoling, county-level city in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

樂陵市.definition: Leling, county-level city in Dezhou 德州[De2 zhou1], Shandong

樂高.definition: Lego, Danish brand of plastic building blocks

樂齡.definition: golden years (after the age of about 60)
